title: Bryce Canyon National Park: Yellow Creek Group Site
body: Yellow Creek Group Site       This is a remote, peaceful site with a reliable stream next to it. It has Mountain Maples, Utah Junipers and Ponderosa Pines. It is our lowest campsite in altitude at 6865 feet (2092 m). It is 4.2 miles (6.8 km) from the Bryce Point parking lot and 1.2 miles (1.9 km) beyond Right Fork Yellow Creek Campsite. Datum WGS 84, 37 34 31.8 N, 112 08 49.8 W. Altitude 6865 feet (2092 km).  Â     Yellow Creek Groupsite and water nearby Images and text courtesy of Ron Warner
